title: Rayner accuses Tories of 'wallowing in sleaze'
content: At PMQs, Angela Rayner attacks the PM over a planned shake-up of the rules on MPs' conduct.

title: Rayner accuses Tories of 'wallowing in sleaze'
content: At PMQs, Angela Rayner attacks the PM over a planned shake-up of the rules on MPs' conduct.

title: Johnson backs shake-up of rules on MPs' conduct
content: It comes as allies of MP Owen Paterson seek to overturn his punishment for breaking existing rules.

title: Scheme to replace EU cash for poor areas unveiled
content: Wales will get nearly a quarter of the total, with the South West the biggest winner in England.

title: UK firms forced to show how they will hit net zero
content: Companies must outline how they aim to meet the UK's 2050 net-zero target, under government plans.

title: Peers demand changes to pension triple lock freeze
content: The Lords votes to continue raising pensions with earnings, setting up a Commons vote on the issue.

title: Sage scientist Sir Jeremy Farrar steps down
content: He says levels of Covid transmission in the UK are "concerning" as he leaves the advisory group.

title: Viral meeting row council changes 'toxic name'
content: Stand-in clerk Jackie Weaver has the authority to switch on Handforth's Christmas lights.
